version_description: Added Bitcoin Cash Support (BCC/BCH)

* Both Bitcoin (BTC) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) wallets are created by default
* Sweep private keys or paper wallets to both BTC and BCH wallets
* Bitcoin Cash (BCH) multisig wallets
* Push notifications for iOS

* Both Bitcoin (BTC) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) wallets are created by default
* Sweep private keys or paper wallets to both BTC and BCH wallets
* Bitcoin Cash (BCH) multisig wallets
* Push notifications for iOS
* Minor bug fixes

* Both Bitcoin (BTC) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) wallets are created by default
* Sweep private keys or paper wallets to both BTC and BCH wallets
* Bitcoin Cash (BCH) multisig wallets
* Push notifications for iOS
* Minor bug fixes

- iPhone X support
- Price charts for both Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin
- Removed amount too low flag for Bitcoin Cash
- Menu option to let user enable or disable sending of unconfirmed transactions
- Both wallets backed up at startup
- Fixed some minor performance bugs

- Shapeshift integration.
- Now available in Korean.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Support for new Bitcoin Cash address format
- Support for BitPay style Bitcoin Cash address format
- Native keyboard input for amount input
- Send max button now on amount screen
- Bug fixes

- Bitpay payments now working.
- Address book improvements.
- Request specific amount fixed.
- Fiat is now the default on the amount screen when sending.
- Back button during onboarding fix.

- Rates now refreshes automatically on wallet details screen.
- Sweep screen shows fiat value.
- Warnings for user when sending to an address without a currency prefix.
- Improved support of QR codes that contain private keys.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Added 'Popular' fiat currencies section.
- Onboarding process is now much shorter.
- Can copy and paste addresses from sending screen.
- Fiat value of each transaction now displayed in the transaction list.
- Can now see which address a transaction was received into.
- Refresh button added on wallet details screen.
- Switch currency button on amount screen.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Memo input now a field
- Fixed minor bugs

- Sound for sending BCH.
- Next steps menu update.
- Services menu update.
- Community menu added.
- Request specific amount more visible.
- Sort wallets by BCH first always.
- Cleaned up Receive screen.
- Fixed bug with Shapeshift fiat amount entry.
- Fixed BitPay payment protocol bug, allowing for BCH through BitPay.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Bug fixes

- BitPay BCH payments now work.
- Check mark animation on receive screen shown when BCH or BTC received.
- Bug fixes.

- Display of BTC wallets is now optional. Can be enabled within Advanced Settings. Current BTC wallets with a balance are unaffected.
- Payment receipt animation now includes amount received (in BCH/BTC).
- Sign messages with private key.
- Transactions in receiving state will now show the memo which has been tagged to the transaction.
- Bug fixes.

- Bug fix for display of Bitcoin Core Wallets. Wallets with balances should appear by default.
- Temporarily disabled signing tool until we add the signing by address feature.

- Fixed bug with updating the number of BCH transaction confirmations.
- Default price display in fiat on home and wallet details page.
- “Wallet successfully created” card has been removed.
- Wallet should default currency based on language selected.
- Fixed bug back arrow disappearing when viewing external links.
- UX improvement for new installs: Wallets are automatically created and email capture is skipped.
- Fixed bug where users may accidentally send entire balance of wallet.
- Fixed bug remove address book.
- Fixed bug scroll address book in detail view.
- Fixed bug scan QR Code in add address book view.
- Fixed bug remove the “send max amount” button in receive specific amount view.
- UX improvement by removing the check mark when a new wallet is chosen.
- Fixed bug icon in addressbook is not displayed correctly.
- Fixed bug empty button appear in desktop version.
- Fixed bug "Amount" should be capitalised to match "Request Specific Amount."
- Fixed bug in detail wallet, header reset after reloading.
- Fixed bug that would crash the app on older iPhones and iPads

- Fixed a bug where hidden balance could be displayed while sending Bitcoin.
- The wallet balance will refresh immediately after receiving Bitcoin.
- We reverted to the previous behaviour after scanning a QR code.
- Other minor bugfixes and behavior improvements.

- We fixed a bug where your wallets would be marked as "Insufficient funds" when they actually do have funds in them.
- We fixed a bug where sometimes specifying the amount in satoshis would actually send 1 satoshi less.
This version includes a bugfix that made the app crash in some versions.

The wallet is now translated to Thai, Hindi, and Vietnamese.

We also fixed a bug that made the app crash in older iPhones (iOS 10).

- We’ve improved how our merchant map works. Also, you can now easily submit businesses that accept BCH right from your wallet.
- We fixed a bug that didn’t allow you to add your credit card details when buying Bitcoin Cash. (Feature available only in the European Union and the UK.
- We fixed a bug where you couldn’t copy the address to the clipboard from the sent transaction window.

Other minor stability improvements.
- Fixed a bug where tapping on "Open in your wallet" on a website, wouldn't open the app.

Thanks to Travala.com and our new partnership you can now book hotels, villas, and apartments with over 40% discount when you pay with Bitcoin Cash.
Go to the Shop section of our app and start planning your next vacation!

Previously:
- Fixed a bug where tapping on "Open in your wallet" on a website, wouldn't open the app.

You can now purchase Bitcoin directly from your wallet, if you are in the UK, the European Union, or South Korea. Get your BTC or BCH now!

Also, this version includes minor bugfixes.

- Fixed a bug when using Sideshift that would allow you to send over the maximum limit.
With Sideshift you can exchange your BTC for BCH easily.

- You can now access local.bitcoin.com directly from your Wallet App.
local.bitcoin.com is the peer-to-peer local Bitcoin Cash marketplace with no KYC.
We’ve significantly improved the speed of new wallets in this version!
Minor bugfixes and improvements.
minor improvements and bug fixes
- Minor improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed bug when using BIP70 payment from wallets using the new backend service
- Fixed bug preventing sequential BIP70 payments
- Fixed display bug for large values of fiat.
- Fixed issue with some translations
- Added third party payment provider Go Crypto support
- Added new merchants to Shop Bitcoin
Hotfix: Japanese mnemonics

From 6.0.4
Hotfixes and stability improvements :)

From 6.0.3
Improved:
Completely redesigned native UI
Fee calculation
Transaction broadcast speed for the fastest wallet experience
Backend stability
BIP70 payment support
GoCrypto Support
Receive notifications
QR Sharing to supports request amounts
New:
Multi-wallet SLP token support
InstantPay feature to allows pre-approved BCH transactions within their safety threshold.
Listings on Discover section including the SLP Dividend Creator
Biometrics integration for spending authentication

1. Sweep is back! Scan your paper wallets by tapping the Gear tab, Tap Paper Wallet Sweep. Scan a paper wallet and sweep funds to the wallet of your choice
2. Improved buy flow. Buy BCH, BTC, or even SLP tokens faster than ever with our new and improved buy experience - available in most regions

1. Sweep is back! Scan your paper wallets by tapping the Gear tab, Tap Paper Wallet Sweep. Scan a paper wallet and sweep funds to the wallet of your choice
2. Improved buy flow. Buy BCH, BTC, or even SLP tokens faster than ever with our new and improved buy experience - available in most regions

6.1.1
Bug Fixes

1. Sweep is back! Scan your paper wallets by tapping the Gear tab, Tap Paper Wallet Sweep. Scan a paper wallet and sweep funds to the wallet of your choice
2. Improved buy flow. Buy BCH, BTC, or even SLP tokens faster than ever with our new and improved buy experience - available in most regions

6.1.1
Bug Fixes

6.1.2
Bug Fixes

- Live Price Graphs, Always stay on top of the latest Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin Core prices
- Track price changes to your assets since midnight, 24h, 7d, 30d
- Transaction History will reflect the fiat rate at time of transaction.
- New privacy settings
- New integrated support system
- Stability and Crash Fixes

6.2.3
Fixes related to inputs in Europe and other locales

- Live Price Graphs, Always stay on top of the latest Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin Core prices
- Track price changes to your assets since midnight, 24h, 7d, 30d
- Transaction History will reflect the fiat rate at time of transaction.
- New privacy settings
- New integrated support system
- Stability and Crash Fixes

- You can now swap directly between BCH and BTC with a click of a button!
- Track the status of your swaps in the inbox
- Improved applock
- Stability and bug fixes

- Receive an inbox message when you buy Bitcoin to keep track of your order status
- Learning center for new users to learn more about bitcoin
- More control over notifications and price alerts

SLP coin pricing support
Asset Distribution Charts
Bugs and Optimization
Improved Swap support

SLP Pricing and Asset Distribution
Improved Swap support
Bug Fixing
- Fix hit area on buy button for smaller devices

Native Markets is here!
Enjoy a beautiful new markets experience, for Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash, with up to date news, and market predictions

Native Markets is here!
Enjoy a beautiful new markets experience, for Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash, with up to date news, and market predictions

Cloud backup has arrived!
- Store encrypted copies of you wallets with your favorite cloud service
- Login into another device and keep all your wallets in sync

Send Bitcoin Cash anywhere using anything
The lowest fee crypto is now the easiest to send
Pay friends back by email, send funds using any chat or social app including Whatsapp, Telegram, Slack, Facebook, and even Instagram.
Give the gift of Bitcoin Cash, and send BCH to friends during Christmas, Chinese New Years, or as a Birthday Gift. If the recipient doesn't deposit it, reclaim it then re-gift it. We won't tell!

Ethereum support: The world's shared computer is now available in your wallet! You can now buy/send/receive/swap ETH!

Unstoppable Domains support: Send crypto to human readable addresses.

Show/hide different blockchains: Control the display of specific blockchains throughout your wallet.

Bug fixes and optimizations.
